comment: Highly recommend! She is helpful and mildly flexible regarding quizzes. She has a great teaching style that caters to all learning types. Covers the material well and gives adequate preparation material for tests. Even provides and opportunity to get half of the points you missed on your first test added on! She is awesome!
definitely recommend!! She makes history fun by telling it like a story. Come to class and take good notes because the tests come straight from the notes. Book not needed. Final not cummulative.

She is a great teacher! I highly recommend to take her. The lectures are long and you must take notes bcuz everything that is on the test comes from the lectures. Dont really need the book. She is very helpful if you need something repeated.
Ms. Feagin is SO NICE! Attendance isn't mandatory but YOU NEED TO GO!! The notes ARE the test... I barely opened by textbook.  Overall, it was a really easy A.  I definitely recommend her!

GREAT CLASS! YOU NEED TO COME TO CLASS EVERYDAY! You will take pages of notes during class but DON'T hesitate to ask her to repeat or slow down.You have 3 exams and 4 map quizzes she will drop your lowest quiz grade. She is SUPER nice and SUPER helpful! When you're in her class act like a college student...SHOW respect...and DON'T slam the door!!!

She is very nice and helpful. However, the coureswork consists of two tests only. This means that you're tested on over two centuries worth of info, and they each count 25%. Overall, I would recommend her - the coursework is manageable, but the tests are high-stakes.

overall a great class.  this class if how you would picture a college course.  she is very smart, very clear, and overall a good teacher.  i took notes on everything she said and didn't read the book and came out with an a.  go to class and take as many notes as possible and you should be fine!

Nice prof who went out of her way to help the class after the first exam.  Gave extra credit points on exams and an easy extra credit essay at the semester's end.  Very patient with in-class questions.  It's history so you must study on

Ok teacher. Kinda boring. Needs to improve teaching style. She isn't that loud so sit up close or you'll fall asleep. Write EVERYTHING she says, and read the book right after class. Half the class failed the 1st tesy, but she was nice enough to give xtra credit.
